about_the_game:
YOUR DAYS ARE NUMBERED!

In this mini-campaign, you play the role of a failed military cloning experiment. After a cozy hundred year nap in a cryogenic chamber, you wake up to the grim realization that everyone disappeared, and you're growing older by the hour. Every day you waste makes you weaker.

THE STREETS ARE MEANER, THE GANGS ARE TOUGHER, AND THE STAKES ARE HIGHER!

Explore the wrong side of Gutter, meet sketchy folks (some are insane, the rest are intoxicated), form new friendships and rivalries, collect trash, become an expendable tool for money, and find the antidote for accelerated aging.

A CITY WHERE MADMEN PROSPER!

  • Variety of hybrid experiments to choose from.
  • More cesspools to explore.
  • New weirdos to befriend and hurt.
  • More secrets to discover.
  • Guaranteed suffering.

content_descriptors.notes: May contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: violence, blood and gore, use of drugs and alcohol, strong language, suggestive themes, general mature content.

name: GUTTER: The Reject

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 230 MB available space

Violência Extrema
Temas sensíveis

short_description: Play the role of a failed experiment in this hazardous new mini-campaign.
